The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 01 September is 67,888 (7,824.5 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 27 August, there were 2,308 new confirmed cases (266.0 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 20 August, there were 2,675 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 14% (367 fewer cases).
